description: This file initializes a CSV knowledge base, sets up an agent with this knowledge, and runs a sample query asynchronously.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base and performs responses.

classes.name: CSVKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads CSV data and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: Qdrant
classes.description: A vector database client used for storing and retrieving vector representations.

methods.name: Agent()
methods.description: Constructor for creating an agent with specified knowledge and search options.

methods.name: Agent.aprint_response()
methods.description: Method to generate and print a response based on the knowledge base.

methods.name: CSVKnowledgeBase()
methods.description: Constructor for creating a CSV-based knowledge base with specified path and vector database.

methods.name: CSVKnowledgeBase.aload()
methods.description: Asynchronously loads the CSV data into the knowledge base, with an option to recreate.

methods.name: Qdrant()
methods.description: Constructor for creating a Qdrant vector database client.

calls: asyncio.run(agent.aprint_response("What is the csv file about", markdown=True))
